DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine whether local infiltration analgesia (LIA) with Ropivacaine and adrenaline is effective in the treatment of postoperative pain after major spine surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Local Infiltration Analgesia in Major Spine Surgery With Ropivacaine Versus Placebo
DOC.criteria: patients eligible for major spine surgery must speak and understand Danish must be able to give oral and written consent alcohol or medicine abuse treatment with opioids > 100 mg daily allergy to local anesthetics severe obesity
